item.title: Issue #1486 created
item.description:
Editorial corrections

XQFO:

  • [x] fn:hours-from-dateTime: Wrong example: year-from-dateTime( xs:time("12:30:00") ) → https://github.com/qt4cg/qtspecs/pull/1517/files#diff-7625c07ae8131ff65c3caa677b188ed2b9b66237312d11c05a2fa2838c6f5c67R9794
  • [ ] fn:void: “Formal Specification” should be dropped. As it is ·implementation-dependent· whether the supplied argument is evaluated or ignored, the empty sequence may not be equivalent.
  • [ ] fn:sort-with: Move equivalent expression to “Formal Specification”.
  • [ ] fn:transitive-closure: Rewrite XQuery comment to note.
  • [ ] fn:parse-uri: Ampersands in 4th example (...&sort=relevance) must be escaped.
  • [ ] fn:format-number: format-number(0.14, '01%', {'percent': '%:pc')
  • [ ] Unify equivalent expressions
  • [ ] fn:civil-timezone: $dateTime → $value

XPath:

  • [ ] Add changes section for =?> (https://github.com/qt4cg/qtspecs/pull/985)

XQuery:

  • [ ] declare record p:person {$first as xs:string, $last as xs:string, *);
  • [ ] declare type app:invoice as map("xs:string", element(inv:paid-invoice))
  • [ ] declare type app:overdue-invoices as map("xs:date", app:invoice*)

General:

  • [ ] Format code (see #1124)

…to be continued:
